319b2(1): po dang byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge zlogs
319b3(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu log bsgreng dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'dzum
319b4(1): zhing rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po las 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu gdung dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sems dang / byang chub
319b5(1): sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dga' ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sbyar chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bden pa la
319b6(1): dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / skyes bu dam pa brgyad la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
319b7(1): bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' phug sbas dang / sems dpa' dbang po'i lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya
319b8(1): lha'i rtsa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla zos sangs pa dang / byang chub sems blo gros khyad par can dang / byang chub sems dpa' bre gros 'phel dang / de dag la sems
320a1(1): byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs cag tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na gnas shing bzhug
320a2(1): ba la rgyal po chen po ma skyes dgra dang / rgyal po'i bka' la gtogs pa dang / blon po dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa dang / zhang blon gyi bu tsha dang / zhabs drung na 'khod pa dang / ba rba
320a3(1): 'khor gyi mi dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bsti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgyan
320a4(1): stong du mas yongasu bskor cing / mdun gyi bltas nas chos ston pa 'di lta ste/ tshangs par spyod pa/ theg mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzar po/ tshig 'bru
320a5(1): bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongasu byang ba rab tu ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'o 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / 
320a6(1): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta zul dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / tshe dang
320a7(1): ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rab tu mang
320a8(1): rnams sde dro'i dris kyi tshe/ chos gos dang sham thabs bgos lhung bzed thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de nas nyan thos chen
320b1(1): po rnams rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer che por mthar chagasu bsad snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing / mthar gyis rgyal po ma rgyas dgra'i pho brang ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ phyogs gcig
320b2(1): tu cad mi smra bar 'khod do// yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang na/ bu mo mya ngan med byin pa zhes bya ba btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/  mdzes
320b3(1): pa ldan sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po// rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas stong mang po la bsnyen bku
320b4(1): byas pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las pa mo ldog pa de/ rang gi ba'i khang bzangs na khyi gser gyi dang pa can yang pa la 'dug par gyur to// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas
320b5(1): nyan thos chen po de dag mthong nas/ khro de las ma langs te/ bslar yang mi 'gro/ phug kyang mi byed/ snya ma yang ma zer/ stan yang ma 'dongs/ bsar snyoms kyang ma 'bul bar
320b6(1): kha reg ste 'dug/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras nyan zas chen po de dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs shes zos nas/ rang gi khang bzangs kyi snga gang ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ 1na
320b7(1): zas chen po de dag la mchog tu sdug par 'dzin pas/ mngon par dga' zhing stan yang gdong ngo // rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bum mya ngan med ces byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mdza
320b8(1): bzhin du kha dog ste 'dug par mthong nas/ bum mya ngan med kyis bran la 'di skad ces sbas so// bra ma 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par
321a1(1): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i nyan thos chen po ste/ che ba nyid kyi yon tan mchos dang ldan pa/ zag pa zad pa/ dra ba zas pa/ zed pa rnam
321a2(1): pa khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjesu thob pa/ sred pa kun tu sbar ba yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par brel ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ 
321a3(1): snying brtse ba can yin te/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba par/ bsod nam gyi phyir rgyu bar khyod kyis ma shes sam/ tsan khyod kyis de dag mthong la mthong bzhin du/ khri las kyang mi ldang / 
321a4(1): bsu bar yang ma byed/ phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan mi 'dren/ dad pa dang / gus pa yang ma bskyed par ci'i phyir ma gus pa ston
321a5(1): cing kha rog ste 'dug/ khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong / de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// yab 'di
321a6(1): ci snyam du dgongs/ ci 'khor las sbyar ba'i rgyal po rgyal phran la ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba/ nam yang gas na nam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mas
321a7(1): smras pa/ yab tsa'o lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha gzhan dag la ldang 'am/ bsur mchi'am rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci mi mjed kyi bdag
321a8(1): pa tshangs pa lha gzhan dag la ldang ngam/ bsur mchi'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu me de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci rgya mtsho chen po mtsho dang / mtshe bu dang / mtsho bran dang
321b1(1): ldeng ka dang / khron pa la phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu ma de ni ma yin no// bu mos sbas pa/ yab ci ri'i rgyal por ri ba ri nag pa gzhan dgal
321b2(1): 'dung ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba gsan tan/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu me de ni ma yin no// bu mo smras pa/ yab ci nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs sran bu me
321b3(1): khyer gyi 'od 'dod pa gsan tam gzigs te sam/ rgyal pos sbas pa/ bum de ni ma yin na// bu mas smras pa/ yab ci ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge wa la ldang ba'am bsur
321b4(1): mchis pa gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo deni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
321b5(1): tu sems bskyed nas/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags la/ dman pa la mos pa'i nyan zas wa lta bur gyur pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
321b6(1): chen po dang bral ba dag la dga' zhing ldang ba'am/ bsur mchis pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur stir bgyid pa 'am/ yab chos kyi rgyal po chen po su zhig chos kyi 'khor/ 
321b7(1): la bla na med pa bskor tam/ skor bar bgyid pa na nyin thos dman bzhan pa/ zhum pa nyi che ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la dga' bas phrag 'tshal ba 'am/ 'dung bar brjod
321b8(1): yab lha'i bdag po lha'i dbang po lta bu zhin rnams par dag pa'i bdag pa don tu gnyer ba na/ dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / ldang
322a1(1): pa 'am/ sur mchi bar bgyid/ yab mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lta bu su zhig 'di 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i sra gang bla na med pa/ don du gnyer ba na
322a2(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/ ldang ba'am/ sur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab su zhig ye shes rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa
322a3(1): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos rtogs pa tshol ba na ba lang gA rmig rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi rjesu song ba'i nyan thos dgra la 'dod pa'am/ ldang ba 'am/ 
322a4(1): sur mche ba'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab su zhig ri rab lta bu'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku don du
322a5(1): gnyer ba na/ yungs 'bru lnga bu'i ting 'dzin gyi stobs dang / ldan pa'i nyan thos ngag la ldang ba'am/ sur mchi ba'am phyag 'tshal ba'am/ 'dud pa'am/ 'dod pa skyed pa
322a6(1): bgyid/ yab su zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba nyid shes rab dang / bsod nams dang ye shes dang / yon tan nyi ma dang / zla ba'i snang ba bdapag tu med pa lta
322a7(1): bu zos nas/ srin bu me khyer gyi 'od lta bu rang gi rgyud la snang ba gnas pa/ gzhan gyi sgra'i nyan thos ngag gi rnam par grol ba la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid bdag ni de bzhin gshegs
322a8(1): pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyang nyan zos rnams la phyag ma'i tshal na/ bzhugs bzhin du lta ci smos/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ su zhig zla ba dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
322b1(1): btang ste srin bu mo khyer la phyar 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab gang nyan thos la bsten pa ni/ nyan thos kyi sems dang gnas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
322b2(1): rgyas dang / bsten na thams cad mkhyen pa rin po che'i sems bskyed pa dang gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di
322b3(1): skad ces smras so// 'di ltar bu mo khyod nyan thos 'di dag mthong bzhin du mi ldang zhing sur mi 'gro la/ phyag mi 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur mi byed de/ 'di dag spyan dang bsod
322b4(1): snyoms la spun mi 'dren pa ni bu mo khyod lhag pa'i nga rgyal can zhig go// de skad ces smras pa dang / bu ma mya ngan med kyis byin pas rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad
322b5(1): ces smras so// yab bdag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ma lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab khyod grong khyer gyi dbul po rnams la mo bzhengs/ sur mi bzhud/ stan mi gding
322b6(1): kha bas na/ khyod nyid lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lags pa snyam bgyid do// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de dag ning dang tshungs pa ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du
322b7(1): byang chub sems dpa' dang po bskyed pa na nyin thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lagaso rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
322b8(1): rgyal dang dregs pa spangs te/ sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar mi byed do// bu mos smras pa/ yab byang chub sems dpa' na'i khon tu 'dzin pa dang / 
323a1(1): za ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa spang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems can thams cad la
323a2(1): 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo// yab nyan thos chen po 'di dag la na khon tu 'dzin pa dang / za ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa bsal bar bgyi ba yang ma mchis// 
323a3(1): spangs pa ya 'gyi ba dang / dge ba 'phel bgyi ba yang ma mchis te/ yang nyan thos thams cad la ni sangs rgyas 'bum gyis nyan thos kyi tshul khrims ji snyed pa dang / ting 'dzin
323a4(1): ji snyed pa dang / shes rab ji snyed pas chos bstan du lags kyang / yab de dag la ni tshul khrims kyang lags las mchi/ ting nge 'dzin kyang galas mchi/ shes rab kyang gal
323a5(1): mchi/ rnam par grol ba yang ga las mchi/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang ga las mchi/ yab 'di lta ste/ dper na bum pa chab kyis bltam pa'i nang du char
323a6(1): bab na de chab kyi thigs pa gcig kyang mi len la der gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro// yab de bzhin du nyan thos rnams la gal te sangs rgyas 'bum gyis chos bshad du lag/ 
323a7(1): kyang de dag yang 'dzin par yang mi 'gyur la/ tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang / de dag la gnas par mi
323a8(1): 'gyur zhing / rnam par 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ro// yab 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu klung thams cad dang / char gyi rgyun thams cad 'dzin cing der gnas par
323b1(1): 'gyur pa de tsa'i slad du zhen/ rgyas mchen pa na chu ma mchis pa srad dul/ yab zang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'adzin pa rgyas rgyal pa nga banan
323b2(1): chos bstan pa'i chu thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing chos bstan pa thams cad de la yang dag par gnas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
323b3(1): dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi snod de ni mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ma skyes dgra'o bu mor gyur pa ni/ 
323b4(1): mya ngan med byin yon tan gzi brjid brgyan/ nyan thos lnga brgya dag ni ljags gyur kyang // de la phyag bya'i phyir ni de ma langs// ma skyes dgra 'di la smras pa ni/ bu mo don 'dang
323b5(1): las mnyan par gyis// khyod kyis nyan thos lnga brgya mazeng bzhin du// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin na re// nyan thos 'di dag bdag gos mthong ba na/ ci phyir phyag 'tshal bsam
323b6(1): pa mi sgeg// bdag mchis yab gcig tshig ni gsan par gsal// dper na ma zhig rgya mtshor mchis nas/ a rarin cen 'byung khung nas ni gcig du blangs// de bzhin bdag
323b7(1): nyid nyan zos thams cad kyang // ye shes dbyings nas nyan zos blang snyam bgyid// dper na rgyal po nor gyi dbang phyug po// sa bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas// 
323b8(1): kar sha pa ni gcig tsam gsol na ni// de'i sa rgyal po bsten pa don ma mchis// gang gis 'khor los bsgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas// bye ba phrag stong gsol ba bgyis na na
324a1(1): ngas ni dbul mang nor dang ldan par bgyid// des na rgyal po legs par bstod pa lags// kar sha ba ni slong ba'i mi bzhin du// gang zhig sangs rgyas
324a2(1): yon tan mtha' yas rnams// zab nas theg pa dman la 'dod skyed pa// nyan thos kun la bdag ni de snyam bgyid// nor rnams sgrub bgyid min ji lta ba// byang chub sems dang
324a3(1): mkhas pa de 'dra ste/ rgyal po chos kyi rgyal po mnyis bgyis shing // byang chub sems dpa' reg nas sems can 'dul bar bgyid// dper na nad pa nad rgyas gzir rnams sman pa yin
324a4(1): grol bgyid de bzhin gyi sgra phyir 'bar ba'i nyan thos nyon mongs rnams kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sman pa lta bus grol bar bgyid// sems can mang
324a5(1): se grol bgyid sman pa bta nas ni// sos gyur sems can la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyi// de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman par gnyer ba ni// sos gyur nyan thos la
324a6(1): ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid/ ji ltar bgyid/ ji ltar nad pa sos par 'gyur ba thams de cad la/ sman pa dag gis gso bar nus par mi 'gyur ba/ de bzhin nyan thos thams cad sos
324a7(1): par gyur pa la/ sangs rgyas sman pa dag gis gso bar mi song ngo // 'di na sman pa gang zhig bdag gis bdag nyid la/ gso bar sems kyis sems can gzhan lam lags te/ 
324a8(1): de 'dra' bdag nyid 'gengs par bgyid pa'ang rgyal na/ sman pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed/ sman pa gang zhig snying rje bskyed par bdag nyid ji lta bar/ de bzhin pha rol
324b1(1): rnams kyang nad las grol ba gyid pa// de na mchod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyi ba dang // 'jig rten kun gyis 'dud par bgyi ba'i gnas kyang lags// gang zhig ye shes rag
324b2(1): pa gtso bo rtags gyur nas// bdag nyid grol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags// de ni sman pa bdag nyid grol bar bgyid pa ltar/ mkhas pa dag gis mchod pa bgyi ba'i
324b3(1): gnas ma lags/ gang zhig ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas// sems can grangs med sdug bsngal las grol bgyid pa/ de dag byang chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed pa ste
324b4(1): de ni 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags par bgyi ba lags// e ran da'i shing sdong mdzes pa ma lags la// de dag rnams kyi grib ma'ang yangs pa ma lags te/ e ran 'da'i shing / 
324b5(1): 'dra nyan thos thams cad kyi// rnam par grol ba'i grib mnye bar snyen ma lags// tsan+dan mchog gi sdong can dag gi tsha ba tshadi yi// gdungs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi nye bar bsten pa lag
324b6(1): de bzhin bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jog rten dag gi don bgyid snyam// ba lang rmig rjes chu ni yangs ma lags// tsha bas badrangs pa zhi
324b7(1): par mi bgyid la// gang+gA'i klung ni sems can bye ba spong // tshim par bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por mchi// ba lang rmig rjes chu 'dra'i nyin thos kun// sems can kun gyi cha bzhi
324b8(1): mi bgyid// gang+gA'i klung 'dra byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can mtha' yas chos kyis tshim par bgyid// ji ltar rin cen char ni 'bab pa ni// dbul po dag ni 'gron
325a1(1): bu len par bgyid// gang zhig nor mang de dag blangs nas ni// sems can dbul po nor dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas rin chen chos 'char 'babs// nyan
325a2(1): zos rnams na dam chos rin chen las/ chung ngu 'dzin te byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can don slad mang du len par bgyid// ji ltar sems can dag ni ri rab kyi// drung du
325a3(1): mchis na gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur// ri bo gzhan la sems can rnams mchis na// gser gyi kha dog can du yod ma 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ri rib bzhin// 
325a4(1): gang dag mthus na lhar bcas skye dgu rnams// rnam grol don tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur// nyan thos rnams kyi ye shes 'dod mi bgyid// yab cig ji ltar rtsa bran rtse mo'i// zil
325a5(1): pa'i 'thigs pas lo tog rgyas mi bgyid// rab tu 'gengs pa'i sprin gyis sa stengs 'di // tshim par bgyid cing lo tog 'phel bar bgyid// nyan thos thams cad zil pa zig
325a6(1): pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' rab 'gengs smin dang 'dra// snying rje mngon byas gang dag bsten na ni// stong gsum dam chos chu yis tshim par bgyid// kar wA ra'i me tog dri
325a7(1): mchog ma ni// des ni skyes pa bud med dga' mi dab 'gyur// tsam pa ka'i me tog dri la dga'// ut+pal par shi ka'ang de bzhin no// nyan thos kar wI ra'i dri bzhin te// de dag
325a8(1): shes pas skyes dgu dga' mi 'gyur// kun mkhyen dri can byang chub sems dpa' la// lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// gcig pu mchi ba de la mtshar ci mchis// gang
325b1(1): zhig sems can mtha' yas khrid pa rmad// nyan thos mi rang gcig pu mchi ba bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' dag ni ded dpon 'dra// mgron zhig gzhan gyis bsad pa 'tshal ba
325b2(1): dang / skye bo kun la stsol bgyid kun mgron bzhin// skra 'brang nyan thos kun ni mgron dang 'dra// byang chub sems dpa' kun la 'gron bgyid bzhin// gzings la brten pa
325b3(1): chu bo chen po las// gzhan dag bsgral par mi 'gyur gyi// brtan gyi gru'i nang du zhugs na ni// sems can bye ba mang po sgrol bar bgyid// nyan thos gzings la rten pa la
325b4(1): bla ste/ sems can gzhan dag sgrol bar ji ltar nus// rdzogs pa'i byang chub grur zhugs byang chub sems// sdug bsngal mtsho las sems can bsgrol bar bgyid// ri lta
325b5(1): g.yul ngor bong bu zhon na ni// dgra las rgyal bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi// glang chen rta dang shing rta zhon pa ni// g.yul du lhags pa'i dgra rnams choms par 'gyur// nyan
325b6(1): zos rnams na bong bu zhon pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' glang chen zhon 'dra ste// sems can kun la phan dang bde slad du// de dag shing rta dbang du bdud kyang 'jom/ 
325b7(1): de ltar bar snang skar ma sa rgyas gyur pas// de dag gis ni mtshan mo mdzes mi 'gyur// zla ba rab tu rgyas pa shar bas ni// mtshan mo mkhas la thig le bzhin du mdzes
325b8(1): ya d+ya nag nyan zas 'di dag skar ma 'dra// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bzhin// gang dag sems can kun sran slang du// ye shes shar bas skye bo snang bar bgyid
326a1(1): yab cig srin bu me khyer tshogs 'od kyis// las rnams la ni 'jug par mi nus kyi// 'jam gling 'di na nyi ma'i 'od rnams kyis// bya ba sna tshogs brgya ga
326a2(1): bgyid par 'gyur// nyan thos 'di dag srin bu me khyer 'dra// de dag shes 'od yang dag mthong mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam grol nyim lta bu yi// shes rab ye shes kyis ni sems
326a3(1): can 'brel/ yab tsag wa brgya dag gis skad phyung yang // ri dgas tshogs rnams 'drogs par mi 'gyur gyi// seng ge'i skad gyis grags chen ri dgas dang // byar bcas rnams kyang
326a4(1): phyogasu 'byer bar 'gyur// yab cig de ltar nyan thos wa 'drar gzigs// de dag skad kyis bdud rnams skrag ma 'gyur// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod spyad pas// bdud
326a5(1): dang de bzhin bdud ros skrag par 'gyur// ya ba tsag rgyu 'di dag gis mthong bas na// theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid// gang dag byang chub dam pa yongs spangs nas// 
326a6(1): theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid// de dag mtshon don rnyed pa thob ma 'gyur// de dag mir skyes pa ni nyes par mchis// gang dag lhar bcas 'jig rten sman slad du// byang chub sems
326a7(1): mchog la 'dun pa skyed par bgyid// de dag legs mtsho rnyed pa lags par rnyed// de dag mi lus thob pa lags par mchis// gang dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // 'jig
326a8(1): rten sman slad las bgyid yid kyang rten// gang dang rtag tu sems can sman slad brtson// de dag u dum+WA ra'i me tog bzhin// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis/ 
326b1(1): byin pas tshogs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag zos nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bu mo 'di spobs pa thogs pa med pa
326b2(1): zhig na/ ci bzod pa tho ba 'am/ ma thob pa bdag gis 'di ltar brtags par byar nges so snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces
326b3(1): smras so// ci bu mo khyod nyan thos kyis theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ sbas pa ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ smras pa ma
326b4(1): yin no// bu mo khyod ci zhig don du gnyer na/ 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu gal te bdag chos 'ga' zhig don du gnyer na ni
326b5(1): bdag seng ge'i sgra ci yang mi sgeg pa zhig na/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar bdag ni chos gang yang don du mi gnyer te/ de'i phyir bdag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so// btsun pa sha
326b6(1): ri'i bu gang 'di skad du/ ji lta bu mo khyod theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa sha ri'i bus chos gang mngon par 'du byas pa'i chos de la/ 
326b7(1): ci nyan thos shes bya ba'am/ rang sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i theg pa rnam par bzhag pa yod dam/ gnas brtan
326b8(1): ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ches de la ni theg pa rnam par bzhag pa med de/ chos de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri
327a1(1): bu mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la don du gnyer ba ji zhig yod/ shA ri'i bus sbas pa/ bu mo chos de la ni don du gnyer ba ji yang med do// gnas
327a2(1): brtan sha ri'i bus bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i chos skye bo'i chos rnams la bye
327a3(1): zag ni ci yod/ za dang du dbye ba ni ji yod/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra'i bu stong pa nyid dang / dbyen pa nyid la bye brag ni ci yod/ za dad du dbye ba ni tsa yid/ 
327a4(1): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang dben pa nyid la ji ltar bye brag med cing za
327a5(1): dad dung ci yang med pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa sha ri'i bus sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du bye brag med// 
327a6(1): btsun pa sha ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' dang bla gab med pa la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do// btsun pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas
327a7(1): kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do// gnas brtan sha ri'i bu cang mi smras par gyur to// de nas tshe dang
327a8(1): ldan pa mo'i'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo ci khyod de skad ces zer ba las na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ni shin tu ches
327a9(1): lhags pa zhig du mthong la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams ni shin tu dman par mthong ngam/ ci khyod nyan zos chen po rnams mthong na ldang bar yang mi byed/ phyag kyang mi 'tshal
327b1(1): srar yang mi 'gro/ gtam yang ma zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la yang sman 'dren par ma byed/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas gnas
327b2(1): brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na skar ma'i gzugs su
327b3(1): gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ snyoms par zhugs na ni kho bos grangs shes kyi/ bu mo snyoms par ma zhugs
327b4(1): na ni shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ni lan cig mnyam par bzhag pa nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen
327b5(1): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar brang ba thams cad kyi sems kyi spyad pa yang rab tu
327b6(1): tu mkhyen na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gartogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi lha ci smos te/ btsun pa' mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen
327b7(1): po 'don de bzhin gshegs pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyi khyad par yin te/ 'di ni tha dad du dbye ba yin no// btsun pa ma' 'gal gyi bu chen po phrogs bcu'i 'jig
327b8(1): rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ chags pa ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes
328a1(1): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal rgya bu chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa na ji snyed cig yod/ mam ma 'ongs pa ji nyid cig sngo
328a2(1): ltar bzhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'i 'gal gyi bus smras pa bu me de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po sems can
328a3(1): 'dod chags la spyod pa ji snyed cig yod zhe sdang la spyod pa ji snyed cig yod/ gti mug la spyod pa na ji snyed cig yod/ cha mnyam pa la spyod pa la ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ 
328a4(1): me'u 'gal gyi byas smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mu'u 'gal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod// rang
328a5(1): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ me'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu me de ni mi shes// 
328a6(1): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'i 'gal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba ni ji snyed cig yang / sangs rma
328a7(1): kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyis bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu
328a8(1): chen po yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ ma nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod
328b1(1): shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bras smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes sa// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas na de dag dang gzhan pang
328b2(1): de'i gong du gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen na/ sems can gzhan dag gsal tsa smras te/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen
328b3(1): po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlum par yin no// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas khrod rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyis mchog tu bsku
328b4(1): kyis btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas smos
328b5(1): rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na shing ljon pa thams cad las
328b6(1): tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i sbrul gyi snying po'i spos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyad par du 'gyur ba'i spos kyi ngad ldang ba yod pa der song shig/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi dra
328b7(1): chen pos smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i ming yang kho bos dgazod zos na sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir ji ltar 'gro bar bya/ de nas bram mya ngan med
328b8(1): kyis byin pas khri de las ma langs pa zhig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras te/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed
329a1(1): ma thag tu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil kyis gnon pa lta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des de bzhin gshegs pa smos rab
329a2(1): tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer des bdag nyid dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ston par 'gyur cig/ tsan+dan gyi dri de dag kyang nyan thos chen po 'di dag gi
329a3(1): tshor bar gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshig 'di skad ces smras ma zag tu/ bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
329a4(1): gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer gyis de nyid kyi tshe/ 'od gang gis nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de dang / de bzhin gshegs
329a5(1): pa dgra bcom lnga pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer de chos ston cing bzhugs mthong bar 'gyur ro// chos ston pa de yang sangs rgyas
329a6(1): kye mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir zos so// tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab
329a7(1): tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer des kyang gsung gi yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas ji skad smras pa bzhin / 
329a8(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed zag tu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
329b1(1): chen po byams pa za rgod phrang pa la gnas pas tsan+dan sbrul gyi skad ma thar char nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal te/ bcom ldan 'das cardzas sbal gyi nga / 
329b2(1): po'i dri 'dreg las byung lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
329b3(1): to// byams pa bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'dis nyan thos chen po rnams kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra skyugs te/ des nyan thos chen po dag la 'den par byin gyi brlabs kyis
329b4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos ston cing / 
329b5(1): bzhugs pa yang bstan/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de'i tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dro des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas so// de nas bram mya ngan med
329b6(1): byin byas tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gri bre chen po la 'di skad ces sbas so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi brabu chen po mkhas pas zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
329b7(1): chen po'i tshe 'phrul dang / rnam par 'bral ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu dag mthong ngam/ zos na nyan thos dman bzhan pa zhum pa nyin pa'i shes par
329b8(1): ldan pa rnams la ldang ba'am/ sa la 'gro ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal byed/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de ci tsam du zag ring bshes sam/ 
330a1(1): mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de na mi shes skye/ bra ma si sbas pa/ btsun pa mo'o 'gal gyi bu chen po gal te khyed 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul can/ sha sreg sa
330a2(1): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ dper na bu ram shing gi 'tshal lam/ 'di ma'i tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshil lam/ 'bras sa lu'i shing bzhin du tshams
330a3(1): med par gang bar gyur nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bskal par brtsis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig 'das pa'i pha rol na
330a4(1): 'dug pa bgrang ba'i thabs kyis rtogs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer gyis 'od de dag mi snang bar
330a5(1): mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi snang bar mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'di skad ces smras so// bu ma khyad
330a6(1): kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de sngon mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa'o/ 
330a7(1): srung chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar nus sam/ de bzhin gshegs pas/ gang dag la gzugasu mthong // gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa// log pas spong bar
330a8(1): zhugs pa ste// skye bo de dag nga mi mthong // sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid blta// 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku// chos nyid shes par bya min pas// de ni rnam
330b1(1): par shes ma nus// shes ma gsungs sam/ btsun pa'ang srung chen pa gzhan yang bram khyad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
330b2(1): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya zab pa sran mazang ngam zhes de skad zer ba ni/ btsun pa'ang srang chen po bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong med kyi/ sha'i migs
330b3(1): ma yin te/ gzugs su me yin no// lha'i mig gis ma yan te/ tshor bar ma yin no/ shes rab kyi mig gis ma yin te/ 'du shes su ma yin no// chos kyi mig gis ma
330b4(1): yin te/ 'dra byed du ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi mig gis ma yin te/ rnam par shes par ma yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gsheg
330b5(1): pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ma rig pa dang / srid pa la sred pa mthong ba bzhin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
330b6(1): ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa mthong ba bzhin no// gnas brten 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltar ma rig pa dang / srid pa la
330b7(1): sred pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni med pa yin no// chos gang med pa de ni blta bar mi nus so// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ 
330b8(1): bcun ba'ang srung chen po de de bzhin no// chos thams cad ni med pa yin te/ de dag ni blta bar mi nus so// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo tsa sangs rgyas kyi chos
331a1(1): kyang med dam/ bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang rung ste/ chos 'ga' zhig yongs
331a2(1): su grub par 'dod dam/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo kho na so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yongasu grub par mi 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta ci smos/ 
331a3(1): bus mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos gang dag yongs su grub pa med pa/ 'chos de dag ci yod pa yin nam/ 'on te med pa yin/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ 
331a4(1): bu mo med pa de dag na med pa yin no// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bas na chos thams cad ni med pa nyid do// med pa gang yin pa de dag la ni lta ba rnams
331a5(1): par spyad par bya ba med do// btsun pa 'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas la lta ba rnam par spyad par 'dod pas ni/ bdag la lta ba rnams pa/ 
331a6(1): sprad par bya'o// 'od srung chen pos sbas pa/ bu mo bdag la lta ba ji ltar rnams par dag pa 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gi tshe bdag ci
331a7(1): rang bzhin/ med pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa nyid du mos na/ de tsam gyis na bdag la lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu ma/ 
331a8(1): bdag gi rang bzhin ci yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag gi rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do// bdag gi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag dben pa yang
331b1(1): yin no// rang bzhin med pa des bdag dben na/ rang bzhin med pa des chos thams cad dben na/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bram khyod kyis phu las chos
331b2(1): zos na 'di ltar khyod kyis yang dag pa'i lbu ba skyes par 'gyur ro// bu mo yang lta ba skye ba la ni rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis yod do// gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag nyid kyi tshul
331b3(1): bzhin yid la byed la pa las 'byung po zhes de skad gsungaso// bu mes smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa'i shes rab can de dag ni gzhan
331b4(1): gyi sgra dang / tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa las lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// btsum pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab can dag na
331b5(1): gzhan gyi sgra mi tshal lo// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po ji ltar na dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/ 'od srung chen pos sbas pa/ bu mo gang gi tshe dge slong ji skad zas
331b6(1): pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar rtog par byed pa de ltar na/ dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems
331b7(1): dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad lhan cig gnas kyang sem
331b8(1): can du 'du shes skyed par mi byed pa de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams
332a1(1): cad ni sngon gyi mtha' de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni phyi ma'i mtha' di bzhin nyid dang ldan no/ chos thams cad ni da ltar byung ba'i
332a2(1): bzhin nyid dang ldan no zhes/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba de lta bus sbyor bar mi byed na/ de tsam gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' tshub bzhin
332a3(1): du zhugs pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo chos de dag la ji lta raM sbyor bar bya/ bu mas smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar de bzhin nyid la sbyor
332a4(1): ba yang med mi sbyor ba yang med par mthong ba de bzhin du/ chos thams cad la sbyor bar bya'o// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar mthor na chos thams
332a5(1): cad mthong ba yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po chos thams cad lo gnyis su med par mthong la mi byed cing 'jig par yang ma byed na de ltar na chos zam
332a6(1): cad mthong ba yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po mthong bye ba de ni mthong ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag ji ltar blta bar bya
332a7(1): du mes sbas pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen pos ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo khas bos ni bdag dang bdag gi ma mtha
332a8(1): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar bdag med pa tsang bdag gir med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad blta bya'o// gtam de skad brjod pa'i skabasu gnas brgyan
332b1(1): rab 'byor gyis bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyi spobs pa 'di 'dra ba ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin
332b2(1): bas smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor rnyed pa las ni spobs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang gis ci yang ma rnyed pa de spobs pa dang ldan zhing gang gis nang ngam phyi rol tsa yang mi dmigs
332b3(1): bde spobs pa ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ bu mo gang ma rnyed pa spobs pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang gis bdag ma rnyed cing gzhan na yin/ dge ba yin ma
332b4(1): dge ba ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa ma yin 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma
332b5(1): byas ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin te/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
332b6(1): pa ma rnyed la/ so so'i skye ba'i chos mi dmigs shing 'phags pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang mi dmigs na/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar gang
332b7(1): gis ci yang ma rnyed pa slebs pa dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ji ltar spobs par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar chos zam
332b8(1): cad ma rnyed pa de bzhin du de spobs par 'gyur ro// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang gos gnas brtan nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid
333a1(1): brjod cing smrar rung ngam/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang / chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la/ ci spobs pa ci yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ nyon mongs pa
333a2(1): med pa dang / de bzhin nyid ni bstan pa'am/ brjod par mi nus so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin/ khyod kyis bu mo
333a3(1): khyod spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// zhes bya ba de ci lta bu yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar med pa'i spobs
333a4(1): pas stan to// bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor chos thams cad la brag cha lta bur mos sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo mos so// bu mos smras pa/ 
333a5(1): gnas brtan rab 'byor ci brag cha la smos pa ci yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo de ni med de/ bu mo rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las sgra 'byung bar zad do// bu
333a6(1): mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor brten nas sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de la ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa ci yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang brten nas byung ba
333a7(1): de la ni skye ba ci yang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ bu mo chos thams cad ni rten nas byung ba'o// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na chos
333a8(1): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de
333b1(1): bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni 'das te gshegs so de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skad ni ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gsheg
333b2(1): pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni de ltar bzhugs so// zhes ci'i phyir bstan bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor mi skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun par
333b3(1): 'bor ches kyis dbyings la ni/ skye ba'am/ nub par 'gyur ba mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ bu ma khyod na'adi ltar skye ba med pa don dam pa'i tshig sa
333b4(1): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bstan pa thams cad ni bstan du med pa'o// de ci'i phyir bstan pa thams cad bstan du med ce na/ de ni bstan kyang rung / ma bstan
333b5(1): kyang rung du dngos pa med pa dang / brjod du med pa'i mtha' mi spang ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod khyim na gnas bzhin du/ 'di lta bu'i chos la gnas
333b6(1): zla rnam pa dag ldan pa 'di nar mchu dang / bums sbas pa/ btsud pa rang 'azer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chan pa ma rna mam pa'am
333b7(1): rab tu byung ba zhes bzung bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni bsam pas phye ba yin/ shes rab kyis phye ba yin/ ye shes kyis phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun
333b8(1): bar rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa khyod kyis shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis shod cig dang kho bos mnyan to// bu mos smras pa/ 
334a1(1): btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldan na/ khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam/ 
334a2(1): gang dang gang gis gnas kyang kha na ma zo ba med par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag
334a3(1): pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir ro// sems can thams cad
334a4(1): yongasu mi gtor bar gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la gnas pa yang yin no// 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang / spyod pa dang bral ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la gnas pa yang
334a5(1): yin no// lus dang srog la ma lta ba'i btang snyoms la gnas pa yang yin no// yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas pa shin tu rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa yang
334a6(1): yin no// lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yang yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba tshol ba la brtson pas chog mi shes
334a7(1): pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yang yin no// bzod pa shin tu thob pa'i phyir ma bstan par shes pa yang yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems
334a8(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad pa de dag dang ldan na/ khyim bdag pa 'am rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang thams cad du
334b1(1): kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa skra ba can zin gyi bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces sbas so// bum khyod mal khrig ser gyi dang pa can
334b2(1): 'dug cing / stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug nas nyan zas chen po dag dang gtam yin par gnas pa yin no// bu mo mi na bar sngan mthon po la 'jug pa la/ sran dma' ba la
334b3(1): 'dug pas chos bshad par mi bya'o// zhes bya ba ci khyod kyis ma zos sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu ma mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin la
334b4(1): 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sgra can zin 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba yin/ 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba ma yin pa khyed kyis shes sam/ sgra gcan zin gyi smras pa/ 
334b5(1): bu mo kho bos shes te/ gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slab cing bslab pa de las 'gal bar mi byed de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// gang dag bslab pa de las
334b6(1): 'gal bar byed pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin pa zhes bya'o// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zani mthong de skad ma zer cig/ btsun pa sgra
334b7(1): gcan zin gang dag ci ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni rtog cing rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ro// btsun
334b8(1): pa sbagacan zin gang dag ma rtogs cang rnam par ma rtog pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa sgra gcan zin rung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa
335a1(1): rnams kyi tshig bla dgas yin te/ de dag na bslab pa las 'gal bar mi byed do// de tsa'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams na
335a2(1): bslab pa las yang dag pa'i phyir te/ de dag ni phyir yang bslab pa la 'dod pa ma yin pas de dag ni rung ba yin no// de dag ni khams gsum du phyin mi 'ong ba yin/ de dag
335a3(1): ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'das pa yin te/ mi slob pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na de dag gi brlab pa ni mi dmigs te/ khams gsum pa brtag pa tsam du shes so/ 
335a4(1): de'i phyir de dag na rung ba zhes bya'o// sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo rung ba dang rung ba ma yin pa la za dad du dbye ba ci zhig yod/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa
335a5(1): sgra gcan zin 'di lta ste dper na/ gser dngul rgyan du byas pa dang / rgyan du ma byas pa la za dad du bye ba ci zhig yod/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo ze dad
335a6(1): dbye ba tsA yang med do/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin de bzhin du/ rung ba dang rung ba ma yin pa la yang yi ge'i za snyad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir za dad du
335a7(1): dbye ba ci yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni tsi dang yang bral ba'i phyir te/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no// btsun pa sgra
335a8(1): gcan zin yang 'di skad du stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug ste/ chos nyan tam zhes zer ba la byang chub sems dpa' na rtsa bting ba la 'dug kyang shin tu mtho ba la 'dug
335b1(1): ba yin no// sgra gcan zin gyis sbas pa/ rnam grangs gang gis khyod de skad smra/ rnam grangs gang gis khyod de bu mos sbas pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'di tsasum dus
335b2(1): byang chub sems dpa' se ga la 'dug ste byang chub thob par gyur/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ rtsa bting ba la bzhugs nas byang chub thob bo// bu mos smras pa
335b3(1): btsun pa gcan zin ci byang chub sems dpa' rtsa bting ba la 'jug pa la stong gsum gyi khams ni/ tshangs pa'am/ brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ngam/ de las gan
335b4(1): pa 'od min man chud kyi lnga gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis lus 'dud de/ thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' zhabs la gtug par byed dam/ sgra gcan zin gyis
335b5(1): smras pa/ bu mo de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ci skad smras pa bzhin no// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zan de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang dper na/ byang chub se
335b6(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsa bting ba la 'dug kyang sman shin tu mtho ba la 'jug pa yin gyi/ nyan thos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa ni de la ma yin par rig par
335b7(1): bya'o// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo btsun pa sgra gcan zin ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de nyid
335b8(1): sras yin te/ bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog yin na/ ci khyod kyis mi shes sam/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ yab mthong shig mthong shig/ 
336a1(1): ji ltar btsun pa sgra can zin bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i sras yin zhes ma gsungs shig/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can
336a2(1): cod pan brtags pa lta bu/ wa skyes par gyur pa rnam yang gsan tra ma/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ 
336a3(1): yab de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal lta bus gshegs pa dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i zhabs 'bring ba na nyin zos mdzes pa ma
336a4(1): lags so// yab de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras gang yin zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas gang sman/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin no zhes de dag yang dag pa'o/ 
336a5(1): smra bas smra'o// yab de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su khas len par 'tshal bas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
336a6(1): bskyed par bgyi'o// gtam 'di brjod pa'i skab su rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo'i 'khor nas btsun mo nyi shus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byad
336a7(1): chub tu sems bskyed do// lha'i bu brgya thams cad bu mo de'i seng ge'i sgra 'di thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 
336a8(1): tshig 'di skad du bdag cag 'di rnams 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sras su khas len to zhes
336b1(1): kyang smras so// lha'i bu de dag gis 'di ltar bu ma mya ngan med kyis byin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad lha'i me tog gis
336b2(1): mngon par gtor to// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa khro gser gyi rkang pa can las babs te/ nyan thos chen po de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
336b3(1): bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / bzhi bri ba dang / myang bar bya ba bsod pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byas te/ dad pa dang / gus pas rang gis
336b4(1): lag nas nyan thos chen po de dag tshim par byas nas/ 'di skad du btsun pa dag rang dga' slad dro bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan du bzhud cig/ btsun pa dag bdag
336b5(1): kyang mchi bar 'tshal lo// zhes kyang smras so// de nas bu mo mya ngan gyis byin pa pha ma la stsogs pa 'khor mang po dang / skye bo phal po ches yongasu bskor nas/ 
336b6(1): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to// phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor/ 
336b7(1): dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gnang ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// nyan thos chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi
336b8(1): zad du dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra'i bus 'di skad ces
343a1(1): / snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bur med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi lhag par 'gyur pa rnab pa de lta bu ma pa kho pa'i ngasam par bya'o// de nas
343a2(1): nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gtam 'di brjid cing mnyan mod kyi grong khyer cheran por phyir ro/ yang de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gas po rgyal gyis bu rma
343a3(1): dri ma med kyis byin pa zhes bya/ sngon gyi rgyal ba las bababs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po'i bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa dang lda pa/ mngor par
343a4(1): shes pa lnga po dag thob de/ zhig med/ dus de'i bu'o mig dag pa'i mi'i las 'das pas byangachub sems dpa'adi dag / dathos chen po dag mthong ning deng dgasam gyib rngu skabs
343a5(1): gtam ci brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang thos so// bu ye de yang gzugs bzang bar rjes pa bstan sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa pa dang nang pi la byams pa/ 
343a6(1): ma pa rjes// paT+Te/ dpying zla batshungs kyis brjod/ ba rgyal gyi'i dab /  ba dag pa'adang / ba shes pa du ya sa/ bram zizhi du/  she
343a7(1): mang sreg shing dang/ mang nga / bum pa thogs pa lnga songasu brgya'i bsod / khrus bya bar thong ba las/ bram ze de dag gis byang chu
343b1(1): mas dang dredag na mchen pa de dag dang /  pa gyu sas pa dugapags sa rlu /  nubapa nga sangs/

343b3(1): / btul zhugs sam/ mchong byed na/ bkra shis pang da ste/ mi 'grub kyis grong bye dra skang bzung ngo // de nas bu bo dri bid kyis byi pas bram ze
343b4(1): pa'ilha'i tshigs gcad de smras pa// 'di dgachags med rtog tu dge shis pa/ sde bo mang po'i sgrog pa 'jig par byed/ 'di dag rnam par dag cing bang
343b5(1): bzhin mthong / dul la grol bar gyur cing mnyam par gnag/ 'di dag rkang gnyis dam bsod nams ning / 'di la yon du la mthongs 'gro bar 'gyur/ 'di la yon pal 'bras bu 'di med 'jog
343b6(1): byir nas sems can ngan 'gror 'gro mi b+hair/ tshul khrims dang ri dul brda ldan pa yin/ 'dod las rgal zhing sdig med re ba med/ 'di dag sman pa mchog ste 'jig rter N+ya/ sdug bsngal ba ni
343b7(1): ba'i srog chags thar bar byed/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag na chos kyi rje/ de'i sras 'di dag rdul med nyon mongs med// 'di dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang rang /
